name: Lee Atherton
what_you_do: Lee Atherton, known as CoachRev, is an author, speaker, and coach specializing in end-of-life, grief support, and resilience coaching, helping individuals navigate the journey of grief and find beauty in the process of dying.
who_you_serve: Lee serves individuals facing end-of-life issues, as well as professionals in public safety who encounter death and dying in their work.
business_focus: Lee Atherton, known as CoachRev, is an author, speaker, and coach specializing in end-of-life, grief support, and resilience coaching, helping individuals navigate the journey of grief and find beauty in the process of dying.
